description: MRtrix3 pipeline for single-shell DTI data with fieldmap-based or simplified distortion correction

steps.name: step1-mrconvert_DTI
steps.description: Convert DTI NIFTI to MIF format with gradient information

steps.name: step2-dwiextract_b0
steps.description: Extract all b=0 images from DTI data

steps.name: step3-mrconvert_mean_b0
steps.description: Calculate mean b=0 image for registration reference

steps.name: step4-dwidenoise
steps.description: MP-PCA denoising of DTI data

steps.name: step5-mrcalc_denoise_residual
steps.description: Calculate denoising residual for quality assessment

steps.name: step6-dwifslpreproc_simple
steps.description: FSL-based preprocessing with eddy current and motion correction (no reverse PE)

steps.name: step7-dwibiascorrect
steps.description: ANTs N4 bias field correction

steps.name: step8-dwi2mask
steps.description: Generate brain mask from DTI data

steps.name: step9-dwi2response_tournier
steps.description: Tournier response function estimation for single-shell DTI

steps.name: step10-dwi2fod_csd
steps.cmd: dwi2fod csd -mask OUTPUT/mask.mif OUTPUT/dwi_den_preproc_unbiased.mif OUTPUT/wm_tournier.txt OUTPUT/wmfod_tournier.mif -force
steps.description: Single-shell CSD FOD estimation (white matter only)

steps.name: step11-mtnormalise_single
steps.description: Single-tissue FOD intensity normalization

steps.name: step12-anat_convert
steps.description: Convert anatomical image to MIF format

steps.name: step13-5ttgen
steps.description: Generate 5-tissue-type segmentation

steps.name: step14-dwiextract_final_b0
steps.description: Extract b=0 from preprocessed data

steps.name: step15-mrmath_mean_final_b0
steps.description: Calculate mean b=0 from preprocessed data

steps.name: step16-mrconvert_b0_to_FSL
steps.description: Convert mean b=0 to NIFTI for FSL registration

steps.name: step17-mrconvert_seg_to_FSL
steps.description: Convert 5TT segmentation to NIFTI

steps.name: step18-fslroi
steps.description: Extract first volume (GM) from 5TT segmentation

steps.name: step19-flirt_coregister
steps.description: Coregister diffusion to structural (6 DOF)

steps.name: step20-transformconvert
steps.cmd: transformconvert OUTPUT/diff2struct_fsl.mat OUTPUT/mean_b0_processed.nii.gz OUTPUT/5tt_nocoreg.nii.gz flirt_import OUTPUT/diff2struct_mrtrix.txt
steps.description: Convert FSL transformation to MRtrix format

steps.name: step21-mrtransform
steps.description: Apply transformation to bring 5TT to diffusion space

steps.name: step22-5tt2gmwmi
steps.description: Generate GM-WM interface for seeding

steps.name: step23-tckgen
steps.description: Generate 10M streamlines using single-shell FODs

steps.name: step24-tckedit
steps.description: Create subset of 200k tracks for visualization

steps.name: step25-tcksift
steps.description: SIFT filtering to 1M biologically plausible streamlines

steps.name: step26-convert_mask
steps.description: Convert mask to NIFTI format

steps.name: step27-apply_mask
steps.description: Apply brain mask to mean b=0 image

steps.name: step28-antsReg_template
steps.description: Register template to native space using ANTs

steps.name: step29-BN_transform
steps.description: Transform Brainnetome atlas to native diffusion space

steps.name: step30-freesurfer_labelconvert_DK
steps.description: Convert FreeSurfer DK atlas to MRtrix format

steps.name: step31-freesurfer_labelsgmfix_DK
steps.description: Fix FreeSurfer segmentation issues

steps.name: step32-freesurfer_transform_DK
steps.description: Transform FreeSurfer DK atlas to diffusion space

steps.name: step33-freesurfer_labelconvert_Destrieux
steps.description: Convert FreeSurfer Destrieux atlas to MRtrix format

steps.name: step34-freesurfer_transform_Destrieux
steps.description: Transform FreeSurfer Destrieux atlas to diffusion space

steps.name: step35-connectome_Brainnetome_counts
steps.description: Generate Brainnetome connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step36-connectome_Brainnetome_scaled
steps.description: Generate Brainnetome connectome (volume-normalized)

steps.name: step37-connectome_FreeSurfer_DK_counts
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer DK connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step38-connectome_FreeSurfer_DK_scaled
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer DK connectome (volume-normalized)

steps.name: step39-connectome_FreeSurfer_Destrieux_counts
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer Destrieux connectome (streamline counts)

steps.name: step40-connectome_FreeSurfer_Destrieux_scaled
steps.description: Generate FreeSurfer Destrieux connectome (volume-normalized)

notes.distortion_correction: Uses simplified eddy-based correction without reverse phase-encoding data
notes.input_requirements: Requires DTI_MOSAIC.nii.gz instead of A2P/P2A pair
